name: Base Squad 49
description:
ULTIMATE RAGE

Base Squad 49 is a game where you can stop holding anger and rage! You can do mindless murders, shoot bloody zombies and different creatures. Once you've hit that bloody world of zombies, you will never stop killing and fighting!

ABSOLUTE FREEDOM

Paint your base in red color. Kill zombies to gain money, receive achievements, buy new weapons, upgrade them and... we can go on and on!
Use a variety of weapons to defend your base. Complete high complexity levels and improve your skills!

A BLOODY STORY OF THE ZOMBIE HUNTER

Even the most bloody zombie hunters will enjoy this game. Base Squad 49 stands for the most exciting thing in a world - a zombie killing! And this process has never been so fun!

And Many Other Cool Features:

  • Upgrade system for your base
  • A massive variety of weapons and armory
  • Base defense mode with upgrade system included
  • 50+ interesting levels
  • Blood! Blood! BLOOD!!!
  • Energetic Sounds & music
  • Huge crowds of monsters!
  • Different types of enemies
